name: Fairy Globe Necklaces
description:
These 1.1" globes of sparkles swirl magically when you wear them or toss them around. They're filled with either holographic glitter and white stars or fine white sparkles and tiny pink hearts. The globes rest on 24" silver chains. 

The (new) Surprise Globes are an option if you can't pick a favorite. They're all one-of-a-kind and super fun and colorful!

15% of the sales from the Holographic Silver Necklace will be donated to The Ally Coalition to support LGBTQ equality!

15% of the sales from the Pink Hearts Necklace will be donated to Susan G. Komen to help find a cure for breast cancer!

15% of the sales from the Surprise Globes! Necklace will be split between the two charities above!

name: Dessert Bows
description:
These fun hair bows have deliciousness sewn right on them. Choose from donuts or cupcakes, either are sure to make you hungry for something sweet!

Make sure to select whether you want a Donut Bow or a Cupcake Bow.

The bows are 3.5 by 5 inches and have barrette clips attached.

name: Darling Donut Sneakers
description:
Great for gifts or for yourself, each pair of Donut Sneakers are hand painted to perfection. The metallic purple glimmers beautifully in any light (it's a wee bit hard to tell in the photographs). The donut design is super bright and fun, a great way to show some personality or bring some color to a plain outfit.

Another thing you can't see in any of the photos is that the tongue of the shoe is painted as frosting with sprinkles!

If you have another color in mind for either the background or donut frosting, be sure to send me a message! Practically any color in existence. I'd be happy to personalize the shoes a bit for you.

If you need a men's size or a size not listed, send me a message!

These are made to order so please allow 1-2 weeks for me to paint and ship them out.

name: Customizable Sneakers
description:
Flowers, cake, spaceships, anything you'd like. Make these shoes the way you want. Once you order them, shoot me a message telling me the design you want (or a link to a photo if you've got that in mind) and the background color of the shoe. 

If you need a men's size or a size not listed, send me a message!

These are made to order so please allow 2-3 weeks for me to paint and ship them out.
